summary: A self-contained PyTorch/DGL example that loads the OGBN-Products node property prediction dataset, preprocesses the graph, defines a multilayer perceptron model, and runs training, validation, and testing pipelines to benchmark MLP performance on the dataset.
business_intent: Demonstrate how to implement and evaluate a simple MLP baseline for graph-based node classification using DGL, providing reference results and a reusable template for further experimentation.
